name: 6.0 Build 106 - Alpha
body:
- Fixed some bugs
- Didn't fix some other bugs
- Added 6 new units to fill in missing T4/5 upgrades
- Added unit outlines for visual clarity, may remove later
- Added mud floor (Contributed by ThePlayerA)
- Added research costs to units in tech tree
- Added ability to replace small walls with bigger ones directly
- Added launch pad destination selection (barely tested)
- Added team colors for storage blocks (Contributed by Voz-Duh)
- Added // integer division logic operator (Contributed by DeltaNedas)
- Balancing of various blocks/units based on feedback
- Made unit factories/reconstructors able to produce even when unit limit is reached
- Reworked unit limit system to kill units immediately instead of deactivating
- Made sector resources be hidden until explored
- Probably some other stuff I missed, check the commit log if you want details

name: 6.0 Build 105 - Alpha
body:
This is the first alpha release of 6.0, a massive campaign and content update. 
While this build has been tested in multiplayer, it still may have numerous issues. As usual, report problems on Github.

There are too many changes to list here, but the important bits include:

- A new unit production system, with incremental upgrades
- Direct unit and turret control
- Renamed and re-sprited units
- New blocks and units
- Naval and insect-like units
- Programmable logic systems
- Weather
- New campaign system (unfinished, barely functional)
- New tech tree system
- Many QoL changes
- Balancing

name: 5.0 Build 104.6
body:
- Added player search bar (Contributed by @fuzzbuck)
- Updated various translations
- Fixed duplicate player IDs - note that this will reset your UUID! [Android]

name: 5.0 Build 104.1 [Hotfix]
body: - Fixed some issues with UUIDs being generated improperly

name: 5.0 Build 104
body:
- Fixed incorrect line numbers in script errors
- Fixed black screen caused by bloom on some devices
- Fixed some music issues with sound playing at 0% [Android]
- Fixed client IDs resetting
- Fixed data resetting between specific versions [Android]
- Added server categories (Partially contributed by @Quezler)
- Added rich presence support (Contributed by @danieljennings) [Steam]
- Added require() function for scripts (Contributed by @DeltaNedas)
- Added color gradient for battery status (Contributed by @Arkanic (eventually))
- Changed script loading: For mods with more than one script file, the main file must be named "main.js" and must require() other files to run them
- Optimized and cleaned up conveyors
- Made unloaders take items from blocks in equal amounts
- Tweaked power block palette
- Slightly decreased differential generator resource usage
- Changed differential generator sprite
- Improved admin management commands [Server]

name: 5.0 Build 103
body:
- Added new icons w/ smooth scaling
- Added liquid void (Contributed by @TsjipTsjip)
- Added bridge opacity slider (Contributed by @Quezler)
- Added "underflow" gate (opposite of overflow gate)
- Added "emojis" for most blocks and items into the font
- Added new tech tree layout w/ better mod support
- Added game log file, stored in data folder
- Added new separator sprite/animation
- Added list of affinity tiles to stats of certain blocks
- Added mod name to description of content, when applicable
- Added basic subnet bans [Server]
- Added search player command [Server]
- Added API for blocking player interactions [Server]
- Added several new options for server, including MOTD and description [Server]
- Added player limit slider [Steam]
- Added visual indication of input mass drivers when configuring
- Added property for mod ores to be added to default generation
- Moved all data files to external folder [Android]
- Made chat no longer clear after /sync
- Increased cost for higher tier tech tree blocks
- Slightly increased build time of basic transport blocks to prevent spam
- Fixed votekick button not appearing
- Fixed infinite storage capacity exploit
- Reduced votekick cooldown
- Changed cyrllic font (again)
- Changed mod class whitelist to blacklist

name: 5.0 Build 102
body:
- Added new map view w/ panning and scrolling
- Added controls to allow moving camera while paused or dead [Desktop]
- Added block health rule
- Added 'config' command for configuration [Server]
- Added more internal teams for alternative gamemodes
- Added features for improved server modding
- Major internal change: package is now "mindustry" instead of "io.anuke.mindustry" (will break plugins)
- Fixed scrollwheel failing to zoom randomly [Desktop]

name: 5.0 Build 101.1
body:
- Added safer mod loading system - errors should no longer crash, but display a log
- Added new Cyrllic font
- Added range display and stats for repair point
- Whitelisted some more classes for scripting
- Made the scrollwheel zoom w/o holding down CTRL - contributed by @joshuaptfan [Desktop]
- Made right-click no longer deconstruct when a schematic is held - contributed by @joshuaptfan [Desktop]
- Fixed scripting not working on some devices [Android]
- Fixed power node desync
- Fixed some blocks not showing up in drill mining list

name: 5.0 Build 101
body:
- Added various new features for modding - see documentation
- Added server block state autosync
- Added support for Thai font
- Added JS scripting - unstable, not well tested
- Fixed liquid junction to item bridge crash
- Fixed launch items not saving
- Fixed schematics not being importable [iOS]
- General maintenance bugfixes and translation updates

name: 5.0 Build 100
body:
- Added experimental lighting system - can be enabled in custom game rules
- Added power diode block (Contributed by Quezler)
- Added plated conduit block (Contributed by Quezler)
- Added hotkeys for selecting blocks (Contributed by joshuaptfan) [Desktop]
- Added light block for dark maps only
- Added customizable global rules [Server]
- Added commands to specify next map in rotation [Server]
- Improved pulse conduit speed (Contributed by Quezler)
- Improved building priority
- New permissive mod parsing format (HJSON)
- Fixed files not importing and/or crashing game [iOS]
- Fixed a few incorrect consumption displays in blocks
- Fixed some modding issues related to sets and formatting
- Fixed 'underwater' ores in editor
- Fixed incorrect bridge linking in certain conditions
- Fixed inverted sorter chains
- Fixed black terrain after schematic construction [Android]
- Fixed many other UI and small in-game bugs

name: 5.0 Build 99
body:
- Added mod dependency system
- Added mod block scrollbar
- Added plastanium walls [Contributed by @Quezler]
- Added toggling of power node connections by clicking [Contributed by @Quezler]
- Added automatic discovery of saves in save folder
- Made save system use file names instead of 'slots'
- Lots of bugs fixed

name: 5.0 Build 98
body:
Many bugfixes, including:

- Schematics not working in multiplayer
- Build pausing not working in multiplayer
- Lots of interface fixes
- Modding fixes

name: 5.0 Build 97
body:
- Added inverted sorters: flip item output directions
- Added JSON config-based modding [Alpha, may be very unstable]
- Added block schematics: save and share your designs [Desktop]
- Added placed block rotation: Hold [R] and use the scrollwheel to rotate a block [Desktop]
- Added saving of blocks broken after enemy attacks
- Added phantom drone rebuilding of broken blocks
- Added radial tech tree layout
- Added autotiling for blocks in build queue and selection
- Added zooming and panning in tech tree/campaign select
- Added username labels to minimap [Contributed by Maxattax97]
- Added targeting priority for turrets/units: when targeting blocks, turrets will be attacked first
- Added new loadout select dialog
- Added link to Mindustry subreddit
- Added banning of blocks in ruleset
- Added internal plugin methods for switching servers and updating game rules
- Made incend bullets set enemies on fire instead of just setting everything on fire
- Made build requests be replaceable in build queue [Contributed by @clfer]
- New building system for desktop; supports editing the queue and pausing building
- Fixed some bugs with mobile input
- Fixed input not working with different keyboard locales
- Improved zone objectives: finishing attack maps unlocks next zones/configuration, waves no longer needed
- Increased minimum FPS to 15 to prevent game freeze
- Changed 'plugins' to 'mods': function the same way, but with more capabilities
- Tutorial text tweaks
- Disabled player-player and player-drone collisions
- Fixed crashing when launching in offline mode [Steam]
- Lots of other various bugfixes

name: 4.0 Build 96
body:
This is a hotfix release. While, in theory, I could release another revision instead, this ensures that people joining servers will be notified of their incompatibility and have all the necessary bugfixes.

- Fixed flying units not attacking
- Fixed bridge mechanics
- Fixed invisible/missing players on multiplayer
- Fixed multiplayer crashes
- Fixed pathfinding crashes
- Fixed pathfinding not working for friendly units
- Fixed many other common issues

name: 4.0 Build 95
body:
- Fixed zone exploit caused by import of zone saves
- Reverted to old file chooser when possible [Android]
- New multithreaded pathfinding implementation
- Made attack command have units move toward enemy spawnpoints in survival
- Made votekick still tempban people after disconnection
- Added 'rally' command to  command center, replaces old patrol command
- Added full Android keyboard support, completely removes any touch input, adds desktop keys
- Added ability to rotate lines while placing [Desktop] [Contributed by Synray]
- Added votekick button
- Added display of power capacity in power graphs
- Added armored conveyors - more armor than titanium, don't accept items from sides
- Added message blocks - editable text

name: 4.0 Build 94
body:
- Fixed tutorial displaying Desktop text on Android
- Fixed common crash related to status effects
- Fixed launch pads launching entire core contents
- Fixed new maps overwriting old ones without warning
- Fixed phase conveyors operating on near-0 power
- Fixed incorrect message dialog layout
- Fixed some crashes
- Reverted removal of router passback

name: 4.0 Build 93
body:
- Added new spawn animations w/ progress bar and names
- Added configurable server whitelist based on player UUID
- Added many new events for plugins
- Added core land animation
- Added player limit for servers
- Added gamemode display for server/save lists
- Added new filechooser for Android, fixes file access on Android 10
- Added core storage space increase via adjacent vaults or containers
- Made unloader be able to take items from any block
- Improved votekick sensitivity
- Fixed many various bugs

name: 4.0 Build 92
body:
- Fixed structure blocks being mirrored in maps
- Fixed mend projector visual offset
- Fixed units not moving after game quit and server join [Android]
- Changed deconstruction to be just as fast as construction (2x -> 1x speed)
- Made Tar Fields map more difficult
- Added loading screen
- Added cached map preview/data, decreasing load times in some cases
- Added save previews - visible once a save is loaded/saved to
- Added automatic saves when custom game is started
- Added server plugins (alpha) - see https://github.com/Anuken/ExamplePlugin for info on how to get started making them
- Added server commands (do /help for details)
- Added votekick command - /votekick - needs testing!
- Added teamchat command - /t
- Added world resync command - /sync - a temporary workaround to the desync issue
- Added import & export of game data - creates a zip file, which can be transferred between devices
- Added dedicated "Game Data" menu in settings for data-related actions

name: 4.0 Build 91
body:
- Fixed black tiles appearing on some devices with low VRAM
- Fixed some crashes
- Fixed missing DLL error on Windows
- Fixed Windows32 version not starting in some conditions
- Reverted back to old networking system
- Re-added command center
- Made unit pads available in non-attack modes
- Added fullscreen button

name: 4.0 Build 90
body:
- Many translations updated
- New networking library implemented
- Fixed game track ending abruptly
- Fixed mirror filter not being usable in map generation
- Fixed Windows32 version not launching (most likely)
- Fixed map filter corruption
- Added fallback shield shader for failed compilation

name: 4.0 Build 89
body:
- Fixed iOS/Android having frozen multiplayer
- Fixed Veins map not having a silicon source
- Fixed inaccurate enemy shoot prediction
- Fixed server crash exploit
- Fixed panes not scrolling with mousewheel [Desktop]
- Fixed incorrect PvP team assignment
- Fixed not being able to tap 'ok' in UI scale changed dialog
- Fixed not being able to play on PvP maps without orange team
- Fixed error message on exiting server after saved map
- Fixed attack map completion displaying low rank
- Possibly fixed Mac version not starting
- Switched to TCP from UDP - experimental
- Added descriptive display when failing to connect due to version mismatch
- Improved smoothness of multiplayer building, rotation and collision
- Improved power node linking

name: 4.0 Build 88
body:
This is the first release of version 4.0; an update that has been in the works for over a year.

Extensive changes have been made since 3.5, including new gamemodes, customizable rules, a new editor, new graphics, new enemies, unit production, new progression, a campaign, and more. Scroll through the release changelog over the past year to see specifics.

name: 4.0 Build 87 - RC 3
body:
*It approaches.*

- Added ambient machine sounds
- Various bugfixes
- Another attempt to fix win32 builds

name: 4.0 Build 86 - RC 2
body:
*Time for a midnight release.*

- Migrated audio backend from SDL_Mixer to OpenAL [Windows]
- Possible fixes for startup crashes [Windows]
- Fixed power nodes making redundant connections in multiplayer
- Fixed audio loops not stopping after game quit
- Fixed some campaign maps
- Slight sound improvements
- Added Discord link to main menu [Mobile]
- Various other bugfixes

name: 4.0 Build 85 - RC 1
body:
This is the *first* release candidate for 4.0, with the final release coming in 3 days. No new features will be added until then.

- Added new sounds for many various actions
- Added random in-game music
- Added startup tutorial
- Added new icon
- Added option to transfer 3.5 progress to home folder
- Added new power node UI visuals
- Updated Discord rich presence [Desktop]
- Possible sound lag fix [Android]
- Possible startup fail fix [Windows]
- Improved node autolinking
- Fixed node place crash
- Fixed every attack map having infinite red team resources
- Attack mode balancing
- Zone map balancing

name: 4.0 Build 84 - Beta
body:
- Fixed UI scaling not working on mobile
- Fixed custom rules not working on mobile
- Fixed crash occurring on loading older maps
- Fixed some older maps having automatic ore gen
- Fixed users being able to open multiple dialogs in menu
- Fixed players being able to play ""multiplayer"" in a singleplayer world via dialog exploit
- Fixed crashes sometimes not getting displayed or saved
- Fixed wave menu jittering
- Improved item inventory display
- Improved UI fading
- Moved launch controls to wave button
- Changed default team color to orange
- Rebalancing: all blocks now cost half as much, with correspondingly less ore generated
- Added new mandatory Attack map
- Added power beam color modulation based on satisfaction
- Added automatic node linking
- Added drill speed/output display
- Added display for turret ammo needed/used
- Added music. Currently only for main menu, editor and launch dialog. In-game music will be added next release.
- Added sound effects; for testing only. Incomplete; will be updated next release.

name: v4 Build 83 - Beta
body:
Testing a new deployment option this build. The Windows package is now significantly smaller, <20MB as opposed to 60MB. This may or may not completely break everything, so let me know if you have issues launching it. 

- Fixed Draug drones being idiots
- Fixed some major map loading bugs
- Added/fixed descriptions for nearly everything
- Added new maps for custom games
- Added icons for displaying allowed gamemodes in maps
- Added map load generation filters
- Added ore generation for all new maps
- Added map symmetry filter
- Added UI scale option
- Added bloom option
- Added new background to zone selection
- Added pan limit in tech tree/zone view
- Removed quit button to fit application guidelines [iOS]
- Improved map generation dialog
- Improved filter options
- New SDL-based desktop backend: may fix some bugs/improve game feel [Windows]

name: v4 Build 82 - Beta
body:
- Fixed crash on startup caused by fullscreen/borderless windowed modes [Desktop]
- Fixed some other crashes
- Fixed saves from older versions not loading correctly
- Fixed FPS limit not functioning correctly 
- Fixed certain filters not previewing correctly [Mobile]
- Fixed fill tool being able to paint over multiblocks
- Fixed a crash on devices with API level <17 [Mobile]
- Removed buggy in-game changelog, moved to a link
- Balancing
- Added indicator for mode-specific buildings to build menu
- Added damage stats to power-based turrets
- New dark-themed UI style
- New main menu background and style
- More sprites cleaned up

name: v4 Build 81 - Beta
body:
- Fixed sprites for boulders, conduits and some other miscellaneous blocks
- Fixed spirit drone factory appearing twice in tech tree
- Fixed some issues with drone AI
- Improved icons
- Made buildings destroyed during construction get automatically canceled
- Improved salvo range and reload
- Improved repair point effectiveness
- Added circle around enemy spawnpoints
- Added additional options to scatter filter
- Added "default ores" shortcut button in editor filters
- Added blend filter for implementing block transitions
- Added two new custom game maps
- Added logo to replace startup black screen [Not functional on all devices, temporary]
- Added button to move server to top on list

name: v4 Build 80 - Beta
body:
- Improved local network server discovery
- Simplified Ground Zero and Craters maps [WIP]
- Split drones into 3 separate roles: mining, repairing, and building [WIP]
- Possible fix to some UI layout bugs
- Added unit pads to tech tree
- Added in-game editor multiplayer
- Added editor tool modes, accessed by right-clicking a tool [Desktop] or double-tapping it [Mobile]
- Added repulsion zone around map edges
- Turret balancing
- Formatted wave timer to display in minutes
- Made advanced unit pads much cheaper
- Updated sprites for turrets and many other blocks
- Removed unit editor until further notice
- Removed difficulty in favor of rule editing
- Removed self-destruct timer
- Fixed block deconstruction exploit
- Fixed door toggling not updating pathfinding
- Fixed players sometimes becoming "orbs of light" [Mobile]
- Fixed blocks and units appearing black after game quit [Mobile]
